queryName: SQL DB Instance With SSL Disabled
descriptionText: Cloud SQL Database Instance should have SSL enabled
detailedDescriptionText: Disabling SSL/TLS on Cloud SQL instances allows database connections to transmit data in plaintext, making sensitive information vulnerable to interception and eavesdropping through man-in-the-middle attacks. This configuration bypasses a critical security control designed to ensure data confidentiality and integrity as it travels over networks. Organizations should enforce SSL connectivity by setting 'require_ssl' to true for all database instances to encrypt data in transit, protect against unauthorized access, and maintain compliance with security standards and regulations.
